recipesJson.name: Skinny Mint
recipesJson.author: jbird
recipesJson.description: Classic girl scout cookie. Vanilla Custard give some texture and mouth feel. Good after 3 days. Best after 2 weeks.

reviews.text: I never rated/reviewed this one because I was jealous. This is the thin mint recipe that I wanted to make. It is glorious, accurate, amazing, delicious, fantastic -- everything I ever wanted in the thin mint profile. This is the top spot. The road ends here. Thank you for this recipe and your efforts.
Spot on profile even using PUR Cookie as a sub. Gonna be my new ADV.
This is a very good and spot on recipe! So glad i found it!
Accurate to the profile. Great mix! Been looking for a all FLV recipe to showcase these flavours.
